input_args.text: "Yemenis stage rally to condemn Saudi war crimes Thu Oct 27, 2016 2:22AM Yemenis rally to condemn Saudi war crimes. © Press TV \nMohammed al-AttabPress TV, Sana'a \nThousands of Yemenis have staged a rally near the site of a funeral ceremony bombarded by Saudi Arabia in early October. The protesters condemned what they call Riyadh's war crimes against the Yemeni people. Loading ..."
